content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in Duisburg, let me start with a considerably high figure of 1200 Euros per month. I believe this centrally located, newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment warrants such a premium price due to its exceptional features and proximity to essential facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, Herr Schmidt. However, I believe that the rental price for this apartment is a bit high. Given that the apartment is unfurnished and the city is not among the top expensive cities in the country, I think a more reasonable price would be around 700 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my expectation for this premium apartment in a desirable location remains at 1200 Euros per month. I understand your perspective but am unwilling to lower my price range. Thank you for your interest, though. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
